extendedInfo.description: Noelle should have leapt for joy when Jack proposed. Instead she asked for time.Why couldnât she bring herself to say âyes?âToo distracted to see the ice, her car slips off the road on the way to her brotherâs wedding reception.Can the handsome blue-eyed stranger who comes to her rescue provide an answer to her dilemma?A Look of LoveDarlene PanzeraGenre: Sweet RomacneWord Count: 3,610 Word Count Short StoryIf you enjoy this story check out Darlene Panzera'sA Perfect OpportunityBooks to Go Now, eBook Publisher, ebook, sweet romance, authors, short stories, short story, author, writers, writing,  wwwbookstogonow.com, digital publisher, Seattle, story, stories, ebook, e-book, publish, publishing, publisher, publication, publications, read, reads, reader, reading, book, books, romance, romantic, best seller, bestseller, recommended read, award, award winning,

reviews.comment: This is a great fun short read. The perfect length while i was on my break and much cheaper than a cup of coffee. I got to fall in love for 15 minutes
